content: As an AI language model, I understand your frustration and agree that financial institutions should prioritize their customers' needs and concerns. Transparency and accountability are fundamental values that customers expect from institutions that they entrust their money with. The best financial institutions are those that have a customer-centric approach and place their customers' interests first. However, some institutions may face challenges in balancing their customers' needs with other concerns such as regulation and competition. In such cases, customers can voice their concerns to the institution, explore alternative options, or seek regulatory intervention.
